cs310w10.MoleFinder.Controller
Class PictureController

java.lang.Object
  cs310w10.MoleFinder.Controller.PictureController

public class PictureController
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Bing Picture controller uses an sqlite database connection and user provided values to create and manage Picture objects for the MoleFinder Application.
